label: Behavior 86755059
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 54.415452 + 0.0012 × t + 0.00008 × t², lon(t) ≈ 12.177193 + 0.0016 × t + 0.00012 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
